content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'operationaldatastore_covid19eixcs7npt3cis_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [operationaldatastore_covid19eixcs7npt3cis_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://operationaldatastore@covid19eixcs7npt3cis.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Cases (
	[ID] int,
	[Updated] date,
	[Confirmed] int,
	[Confirmed_Change] int,
	[Latitude] numeric(10,5),
	[Longitude] numeric(10,5),
	[ISO2] nvarchar(4000),
	[ISO3] nvarchar(4000),
	[Country_Region] nvarchar(4000),
	[load_time] datetime2(7)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Cases/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [operationaldatastore_covid19eixcs7npt3cis_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Cases
GO
